name: Wafer Loaded
description: Wafer #223 loaded in slot 3.

name: Laser Scan Started
description: Laser module started scan for Wafer #223.

name: Image Analysis Initiated
description: Image-based analysis initiated for Wafer #223.

name: Image Latency Warning
description: Latency spike detected in image capture module.

name: Throughput Decrease
description: Low throughput: 5 wafers processed in the last 10 minutes.

name: Focus Adjustment Failure
description: Laser module failed self-check on focus adjustment (code-ERR105).

name: Module Nonresponsive
description: Image Processing Module ceased responding (code-ERR220).

name: Wafer Placed
description: Wafer #182 loaded in Tool-21.

name: Process Sequence Start
description: Start of process sequence for Wafer #182 logged.

name: Transaction Retry
description: Application retried process logging due to DB timeout.

name: Connection Pool Saturated
description: No more DB connections available (pool size = 100).

name: Unable to Log Process Step
description: Failed to log process step; process status unknown for Wafer #182.

name: Tool Idle Warning
description: Tool-21 transitioning to idle after failure to receive process status.

name: Throughput Alert
description: Wafer throughput below expected rate: 2 wafers in last 10 minutes.

name: Config Push Attempt
description: Sent scheduled config update to all tools: expected version 3.2.5.

name: Config Update Rejected
description: Tool-12 rejected config update: version mismatch (installed: 3.3.0-beta, expected: 3.2.5).

name: Performance Outlier Detected
description: Tool-12: throughput is 20% lower than fab average.

name: Metric Deviation
description: Process metrics from Tool-12 deviate from expected range (possible incompatibility).

name: Version Check Failed
description: Tool-12 is running unapproved firmware version 3.3.0-beta.

name: Throughput Alert
description: Wafer throughput below expected rate: 3 wafers in last 10 minutes.

name: Wafer Assigned for Movement
description: Wafer #403 assigned for movement to Tool-03 handler.

name: Handler Arm Pick Initiated
description: Handler arm initiated pick action for Wafer #403 (Tool-03).

name: Movement Delay Detected
description: Handler arm movement delay detected during pick action (Tool-03).

name: Timeout Position Not Reached
description: Handler did not reach expected position within timeout (Tool-03).

name: Handler Arm Stuck
description: Handler arm stuck; unable to complete move operation (error code: MECH215).

name: Subsystem Self-Check Failed
description: Handler subsystem self-check failed (Error: excessive load on actuator).

name: Wafer In Process
description: Wafer #310 in process on Tool-05.

name: Arm Movement Delay
description: Arm movement slower than threshold in Loader Module.

name: Memory Usage Spike
description: Memory usage spike detected in Tool-05 application service.

name: Communication Retry
description: Process controller reports repeated retries on communication with Chamber Module.

name: Temperature Spike Detected
description: Hardware fault detected: Chamber Module temperature spike.

name: Emergency Halt
description: Emergency halt triggered for Tool-05, operator requested for intervention.

name: Unscheduled Maintenance Initiated
description: Unscheduled maintenance mode initiated by engineering on Tool-05.

name: Software Update
description: New software version 2.8.4 installed on Tool-19.

name: Resumed Processing
description: Tool-19 resumed wafer processing after software update.

name: Memory Usage Rising
description: Detected gradual increase in memory usage in Tool-19 process controller.

name: Memory Threshold Exceeded
description: Memory usage exceeded recommended threshold (85%) in process controller.

name: Controller Unresponsive (OOM)
description: Tool-19 process controller unresponsive (out-of-memory condition).

name: Wafers in Unknown Status
description: 3 wafers in-progress marked as 'unknown status' due to system reset.

name: Scan Complete
description: Laser Measurement Module completed scan for Wafer #116 (data packet L-1102 sent to Image Acquisition Module).

name: Data Received
description: Image Acquisition Module successfully received data packet L-1102 from Laser Measurement Module.

name: Transfer Delay
description: Data transfer to Data Analytics Module delayed (output queue length=120, threshold=80).

name: No Data Received
description: No new data received for Wafer #116 in last 5 minutes (expected every 2 minutes).

name: Buffer Overflow
description: Buffer overflow at Image Acquisition Moduleâ€”data flow to Data Analytics Module interrupted for batch #4901.

name: Instrument Disconnected
description: Instrument-02 disconnected from the network; entering offline log mode.

name: Log Storage Increase
description: Local log storage usage increased to 100MB (offline accumulation).

name: High Memory Usage
description: Memory usage elevated due to offline log file generation.

name: Instrument Reconnected
description: Instrument-02 reconnected to network.

name: Bulk Log Upload Started
description: Instrument-02 started pushing 250 log files to server.

name: Temporary Network Congestion
description: Network congestion detected during bulk log upload from Instrument-02.

name: Log Upload Complete
description: Log upload complete. Memory usage and network stabilized.
